framework

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This is our secret leader controller. SLPanel decides when to do a task, like read from a central file, but this class performs the actual work. Basically this class knows what to do when its told to do work. The main point of this is to reduce the work of our panel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(java.lang.String userNameIn)
      Runs most of the logic in the game
